full_text: Feb-16-2006 18:27 FROM:LIMITED BRANDS LEGAL 6144157188 TO:912127500381 P.4/5 Limitedbrands Victoria's Secret Stores Incident Report VSS2006015582 Printed on: 2/15/2006 Investigative Notes: Colon verified XBR and found several suspicious returns on 10/30 and 11/2/05 totaling approximately $210.00 During the course of the interview did not admit to any fraudulent refunds. On 11/4/05 RLPM Colon spoke to an associate by the name of Shayna Casdorph and she stated that she observed several items of VSS merchandise in Halls' car one day. The items found were Hello Perfume, tank top, bras, panties and accessories. Resigned at the conclusion of interview and Co Manager keyed termination as not rehirable for policy violation. text_blocks.content: Limitedbrands Victoria's Secret Stores Incident Report VSS2006015582

Colon verified XBR and found several suspicious returns on 10/30 and 11/2/05 totaling approximately $210.00 During the course of the interview did not admit to any fraudulent refunds. On 11/4/05 RLPM Colon spoke to an associate by the name of Shayna Casdorph and she stated that she observed several items of VSS merchandise in Halls' car one day. The items found were Hello Perfume, tank top, bras, panties and accessories. Resigned at the conclusion of interview and Co Manager keyed termination as not rehirable for policy violation.
Loss/Recovery: Direct Loss: $209.00 Amount Recovered: $209.00 Indirect Loss: $0.00 Net Loss: $0.00

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned incident report from Victoria's Secret Stores. The report details an investigation into suspicious returns and the subsequent termination of an employee. The document is marked as 'Page 4 of 5' and has a public records request number.
